    | text      = Candy corruption on a stock.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:16.399
    | text      = Willy Wonka's going down.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:19.399
    | text      = Yeah, so Jordan, today we have an episode to go over.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:22.399
    | text      = Interesting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:23.399
    | text      = Yep.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:24.399
    | text      = We are gonna be talking about August 24th, 2009.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:27.399
    | text      = What happened in 2009 again?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:31.399
    | text      = I was about to ask you that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:33.399
    | text      = That's a good question.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:34.399
    | text      = It's a fun game to see if you have any idea why that might be the date that we chose.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:39.399
    | text      = August 26th, 2009.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:41.399
    | text      = Nope.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:42.399
    | text      = All right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:43.399
    | text      = 24th.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:44.399
    | text      = August 24th, 2008.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:45.399
    | text      = Not sure it would make...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:47.399
    | text      = What day is it?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:48.399
    | text      = 2009.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:49.399
    | text      = 2009.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:50.399
    | text      = What was going on?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:51.399
    | text      = The year is August 24th.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:52.399
    | text      = The day, 2009.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:53.399
    | text      = I was maybe, let's see, I was like 22 at the time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:07:59.399
    | text      = Happy birthday.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:00.399
    | text      = So I was drinking.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:02.399
    | text      = Yep.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:03.399
    | text      = That's what happened on August 24th, 2009.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:06.399
    | text      = It's not what this was about.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:08.399
    | text      = Oh, okay.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:09.399
    | text      = What is it about?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:10.399
    | text      = So at first glance, this might seem like a really strange date to choose.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:13.399
    | text      = Somewhat random.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:14.399
    | text      = But August 24th, 2009 was the 50th anniversary of possibly a momentous day in history.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:21.399
    | text      = That was the day that the Guardian took on the name that we know it by today, which is
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:25.600
    | text      = the Guardian.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:26.600
    | text      = Oh.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:27.600
    | text      = I thought you were going to say a different name.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:31.600
    | text      = The fucking Guardian.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:34.279
    | text      = So that paper was founded in 1821, largely as a response to the aftermath of the Peter
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:39.299
    | text      = Lew massacre.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:40.639
    | text      = The economy was in shambles and people felt politically disenfranchised, demanding changes
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:44.460
    | text      = to parliament to reflect their needs.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:47.480
    | text      = The damages or the demands they had were things like, we should be able to vote, which was
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:50.940
    | text      = pretty radical at that time in the 1820s.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:53.519
    | text      = It still is, honestly, in the United States at least.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:56.679
    | text      = On August 16th, 1819, a large gathering took place here in Manchester where one of the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:02.000
    | text      = speakers was a somewhat famous working class radical named Henry Hunt, who would go on
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:06.299
    | text      = to later years to be elected to parliament, where he was actually the first person in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:10.200
    | text      = that body to ever propose letting women vote.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:14.519
    | text      = He was killed shortly after.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:17.279
    | text      = Ripped limb from limb.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:18.840
    | text      = But he did that stuff in government in the 1830s, and he had some bad times to get through
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:24.000
    | text      = first.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:25.000
    | text      = Hunt was a particular target of the authorities because he believed that getting large groups
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:29.639
    | text      = of people together and collectively making a demand was a politically useful tactic.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:34.480
    | text      = So when he was set to speak at this 1819 rally, the magistrates in town were concerned that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:39.080
    | text      = it would spark a riot.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:40.620
    | text      = The conditions that normal people were living in were desperate and Hunt was a notoriously
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:44.299
    | text      = good speaker, so this was a potential powder keg.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:48.259
    | text      = The authorities ultimately made a very bad decision and set about trying to arrest Hunt
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:52.039
    | text      = while he was on stage.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:56.320
    | text      = This was a crowd estimated to be at least around 50,000 people, and Hunt showed up at
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:00.799
    | text      = about 1pm.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:02.360
    | text      = The magistrates were watching from a nearby building, and when he got such a huge response
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:06.279
    | text      = when he took the stage, they realized that they should probably do something, they gotta
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:10.639
    | text      = act.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:11.639
    | text      = The crowd was so large and packed in that they decided that they needed to send in a
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:14.379
    | text      = fucking cavalry.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:16.600
    | text      = So they sent for horsemen, and in their rush to get to the site of the rally, one cop knocked
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:20.919
    | text      = over a lady named Ann Fildes, who was carrying her two year old son in her arms.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:25.220
    | text      = She survived, but the young kid William died.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:27.480
    | text      = What, a cop murdered somebody?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:29.720
    | text      = First casualty.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:30.720
    | text      = What?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:31.720
    | text      = He was not alone that day, though.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:34.360
    | text      = Thanks to the unnecessary chaos of trying to arrest Hunt and other radicals, at least
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:38.279
    | text      = 17 other people lost their lives, and hundreds were injured.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:42.539
    | text      = Some were trampled by the cavalry, one was killed in revenge the following day, and one
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:47.399
    | text      = guy named John Rhodes was stabbed in the head, and then his death was determined to have
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:51.240
    | text      = been from natural causes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:52.600
    | text      = Well, I mean, it's fairly natural if you've got a knife in your head to die.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:57.279
    | text      = Cause of fact.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:00.799
    | text      = Henry Hunt was arrested and charged with high treason and sedition.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:04.919
    | text      = He served his sentence, and when he got out, he got right back to his political causes,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:08.840
    | text      = embodied by the slogan, quote, equal laws, equal rights, annual parliaments, universal
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:13.759
    | text      = suffrage, and the ballot.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:15.740
    | text      = In many ways, you could look at this situation and see some parallels.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:18.879
    | text      = You could look at January 6th as like a watered down Peterloo, and also it would be the exact
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:23.919
    | text      = opposite.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:24.919
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:25.919
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:26.919
    | text      = Evilloo.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:27.919
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:28.919
    | text      = In the same way you could see Henry Hunt as kind of like an Alex Jones type, with diametrically
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:32.639
    | text      = different political ideas.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:34.440
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:35.440
    | text      = They're similar in that you have a rally that's pretty big and it goes bad, and there was
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:40.559
    | text      = a rousing political speaker there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:44.759
    | text      = In the aftermath of the massacre, the government cracked down on radical working class and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:48.440
    | text      = left wing activity.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:50.059
    | text      = The six acts were passed, which were meant to limit any radical group and their ability
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:53.679
    | text      = to organize.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:54.919
    | text      = The seditious meetings act made it so you needed government permission to hold any meeting
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:58.639
    | text      = of more than 50 people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:00.000
    | text      = That worked.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:01.000
    | text      = We're done.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:02.000
    | text      = We can't do it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:03.000
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:04.000
    | text      = Got us.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:05.000
    | text      = Or any meeting also where you intended to deliberate about public grievances, or any
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:09.679
    | text      = meeting where you, quote, were considering, proposing, or agreeing to any petition, complaint,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:15.240
    | text      = remonstration, declaration, restitution, or address.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:18.559
    | text      = How dare you speak to the wealthy fools?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:21.200
    | text      = Are you doing an Alex Jones impression from the intro job?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:24.000
    | text      = That was my best.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:25.000
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:26.000
    | text      = That was my best.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:27.000
    | text      = More relevant to our matter today is that the newspaper and stamp duties act, which
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:30.960
    | text      = made it way harder to put out any kind of publication unless you had a lot of money.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:36.259
    | text      = That act begins, quote, pamphlets and printed papers containing observations upon public
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:41.159
    | text      = events and occurrences, tending to excite hatred and contempt of the government and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:45.759
    | text      = the constitution of these realms as bylaws established and also vilifying our holy religion
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:50.919
    | text      = have lately been published in great numbers and at very small prices.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:54.360
    | text      = It is expedient that the same should be restrained.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:58.200
    | text      = The act required fees on publishing and, quote, that no person shall print or publish for
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:03.679
    | text      = sale any newspaper or any pamphlet or any other paper containing any public news, intelligence
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:09.340
    | text      = or occurrences, or any remarks or observations thereon or upon any matter of church or state
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:15.159
    | text      = until he or she have entered into a recognizance before a baron.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:20.279
    | text      = If you wanted to publish, you needed to enter into a bond, which would be used to pay any
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:24.879
    | text      = fines that you might rack up while publishing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:27.679
    | text      = I have only one thing to say to that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:29.960
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:30.960
    | text      = The crunchies in the rocks.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:31.960
    | text      = The crunchies in the rocks.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:32.960
    | text      = The crunchies in the rocks, man.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:34.759
    | text      = You were basically automatically on probation if you were trying to publish something.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:38.879
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:39.879
    | text      = Rich people are great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:40.879
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:41.879
    | text      = So in that environment, speech was a little chilled.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:44.720
    | text      = Why?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:45.720
    | text      = And nonconformist publications were becoming rarer and rarer.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:49.159
    | text      = And then on May 5th, 1821, what we know as the Guardian published their first issue specifically
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:54.779
    | text      = in an attempt to provide a voice that was being eliminated from the public space.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:58.679
    | text      = They had a lot of misspellings then too, just in case you were wondering.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:02.519
    | text      = Also I'm kidding.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:03.519
    | text      = I'm kidding.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:04.519
    | text      = They were founded and may have been a bit preferable to other publications at the time,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:08.919
    | text      = but they were very hostile to the cause of people like Henry Hunt and other radicals.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:13.419
    | text      = They would be like an outlet that thought they were pretty liberal now, but they also
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:18.080
    | text      = thought the writers in Hollywood should stop striking.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:20.720
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:21.720
    | text      = And certain class voices condemned the paper at the time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:25.240
    | text      = So maybe people shouldn't be too surprised that they famously supported appeasing people
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:30.080
    | text      = who kept slaves.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:31.639
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:32.639
    | text      = So they started on May 5th, but why are we doing an episode about it on August 24th?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:38.159
    | text      = That seems weird.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:39.159
    | text      = I swear it's August 26th.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:43.120
    | text      = And it's because on August 24th, they changed their name to the Guardian.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:48.200
    | text      = Previously it was called London Guardian.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:52.480
    | text      = I remember articles London Guardian like 15 years ago that London Guardian, London Guardian.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:58.519
    | text      = It was the Manchester Guardian.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:04.960
    | text      = Previously it was called Manchester Guardian.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:07.120
    | text      = It's from here in Manchester and has never been called the London Guardian.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:10.240
    | text      = And yes, all of this introduction and this entire lead up was an elaborate way to mock
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:15.480
    | text      = Alex for constantly calling it the London Guardian.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:21.960
    | text      = Let's put that at 12 minutes for that punch.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:24.879
    | text      = It's worth every minute.
